name: Earth Spirit
title: Kaolin
lore: Deep in the barren hills of Narshen, Kaolin the Earth Spirit was one of the four spirits, guardians of elemental balance.

boulderSmash.name: Boulder Smash
boulderSmash.description: Earth Spirit kicks a Stone Remnant or enemy unit, stunning and damaging units in its path.

rollingBoulder.name: Rolling Boulder
rollingBoulder.description: Earth Spirit rolls as a boulder, stunning and damaging enemies. Travels faster if it passes through a Remnant.

geomagneticGrip.name: Geomagnetic Grip
geomagneticGrip.description: Pulls a Stone Remnant toward Earth Spirit, silencing enemies it passes through.

magnetize.name: Magnetize
magnetize.description: Magnetizes nearby enemies, causing them to take damage over time. Remnants refresh and spread the debuff.
